law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this title, an individual may not:...
law.text:
Except as otherwise provided in this title, an individual may not:
Perform the duties of, attempt to perform the duties of, or offer to perform the duties of a program administrator or residential child and youth care practitioner in this State unless certified by the Board; or
Supervise, direct, induce, or aid an uncertified individual to perform the duties of a program administrator or residential child and youth care practitioner.
